experience.title: Co-Founder & Chief Executive Officer
experience.description: At Evermorrow Labs, we believe the near future of XR will be populated with a plethora of democratised and seamlessly accessible immersive experiences with no barrier to entry for any headset owner. We are disrupting the way VR games are built, played and monetised. We are building a free to play ecosystem of fun, interactive and interconnected experiences. Backed by gradCapital.Hit me up on ojas@evermorrowlabs.com or

experience.title: Founder in Residence W23 BA Grad
experience.description: Part of a curated community of exceptional future founders, working to build globally impactful companies together.Entrepreneur First is the world’s leading talent investor, backed by top founders including Patrick and John Collison, Reid Hoffman, Tom Blomfield, Sara Clemens, Nat Friedman, and Matt Mullenweg. EF brings together people with extraordinary futures to develop their most ambitious ideas and raise money from top global investors.

honors_and_awards.title: The Nexus x Luminar Ecosystem | Sui x Kucoin Hackathon
honors_and_awards.description: Engineered the first ever integrated project across multiple teams in a hackathon of this scale. With Luminar as a system of two games with interoperability and immersive advertising. This coupled with Nexus, a secure and dependable marketplace for services and spots, truly utilizing verification tools and reconcilation to it's best.

honors_and_awards.title: Project ARise | Ennovate 2023 Finalist
honors_and_awards.description: Developed an AR gamification layer to help making Ennoventures' QA technology reach more users. Built on Unity with Vuforia and inspired quite a bit by Pokemon GO and Tamigotchis.

honors_and_awards.title: Project Arcadia | Pi Hackathon 2023
honors_and_awards.description: Integrated modern Web3 features into a mobile metaverse prototype powered by Pi. Building up on the functionalities built before and a novel use of NFTs to ensure stable economies, being a template for future MMOs to foster interoperability and security.

honors_and_awards.title: Consensys Snaps | Event Captain | Bronze | Inter IIT Tech Meet 11.0
honors_and_awards.description: Delivered an entire ecosystem of snaps based on cases with a significant user base. Targeted high penetration applications and understanding integral subsystems that require developers to reinvent the wheel while building projects.

honors_and_awards.title: Project Haven | Global Top 5 | Ready Player 3 Hackathon
honors_and_awards.description: Built a novel tokenomic to ensure a stable economy and integrated modern Web3 features into a metaverse prototype, integrated use cases built on monetisation and free markets. Built an inherent stable circular economy designed to counter scaling and stagnation.

honors_and_awards.title: The Haven Project | Finalist | UST D3code Hackathon
honors_and_awards.description: Built prototype metaverse multiplayer architecture with easy integration for web based projects

honors_and_awards.title: Winner | Newrl Hackathon
honors_and_awards.description: Delivered a proof of concept for an MMO metaverse aiming at a new social media ecosystem on the Newrl blockchain.

honors_and_awards.title: Silver | GMetri's Growth Strategy For Metaverse | 10th Inter IIT Tech Meet
honors_and_awards.description: Designing a marketing strategy for GMetri's no code metaverse platform with allocated spend of 2 million dollars over 3 years

honors_and_awards.title: Winner | Samsung Innovation Award 2021
honors_and_awards.description: Developed the winning project- The Betaverse. A prototype user facing decentralised platform that can be leveraged by developers to publish on a single unified free metaverse with seamless asset and utility integration through custom CDNs.
